item.title: 8 家值得关注的欧洲国防科技初创企业
item.description:
欧洲推动停止依赖美军，催生了新一代公司。【原文：

A European push to stop relying on the US military has spawned a new generation of companies.

】

item.title: 尽管欧尔班施加压力，匈牙利仍将维持利率不变：决策指南
item.description: 匈牙利央行将连续第 13 个月维持欧盟最高借贷成本不变，此前决策者们拒绝了政府要求降低借贷成本的呼吁。【原文：Hungary’s central bank is set to leave the European Union’s highest borrowing costs unchanged for the 13th straight month, after policymakers rebuffed government calls to cut them.】

item.title: 中美领导人准备贸易谈判，金属走高
item.description: 有迹象表明，中美贸易紧张局势可能在世界前两大经济体领导人会晤前得到缓解，基本金属因此走高。【原文：Base metals edged higher on signs that US-China trade tensions could ease ahead of a meeting between the leaders of the world’s top two economies.】

item.title: 在人工智能的帮助下，Sea 首席执行官李开复看到了通往 1 万亿美元市值的道路
item.description: Sea Ltd.的创始人Forrest Li告诉员工，随着东南亚电子商务领军企业加入全球科技公司的行列，该公司有可能实现万亿美元的市值— 增长约10倍—。【原文：Sea Ltd. founder Forrest Li told employees a trillion dollar market capitalization — an increase of about 10 times — is possible as the Southeast Asia e-commerce leader joins tech companies globally betting on artificial intelligence for growth.】

item.title: 据说 GCash 将把菲律宾破纪录的首次公开募股推迟到 2026 年下半年
item.description: 据知情人士透露，金融科技公司GCash的目标是在2026年下半年在马尼拉首次公开募股，由于菲律宾股市低迷，这一目标晚于此前的预期。【原文：Fintech firm GCash is aiming for an initial public offering in Manila in the second half of 2026, according to people with knowledge of the matter, later than previously anticipated as the Philippine stock market sags.】

item.title: 日本称正逐步减少对俄罗斯液化天然气的依赖
item.description: 日本贸易大臣重申，日本的目标是减少对俄罗斯液化天然气的依赖，但不能立即停止进口。【原文：Japan’s trade minister reiterated that the country aims to curb dependence on Russian liquefied natural gas, but can’t immediately halt imports.】

item.title: 贝莱德称保险公司有望继续加大私人赌注
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的一项调查显示，作为平滑长期回报战略的一部分，管理着 23 万亿美元资金的保险公司计划增加更多的私人市场持股。【原文：Insurers overseeing $23 trillion plan to add even more to their private market holdings as part of a strategy to smooth long-term returns, according to a BlackRock Inc. survey.】

item.title: 据说海尔正在考虑物联网部门 Cosmoplat 的 IPO 事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，海尔智能家居有限公司（Haier Smart Home Co.【原文：Haier Smart Home Co. is considering an initial public offering of its internet-of-things unit Cosmoplat, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 亿万富翁 Kakao 创始人涉嫌操纵股票罪名成立
item.description: 韩国一家法院驳回了针对 Kakao 公司创始人布莱恩-金（Brian Kim）的股票操纵案，为这位亿万富翁洗脱了有损其互联网先驱声誉的罪名。【原文：A South Korean court dismissed the stock manipulation case against Kakao Corp. founder Brian Kim, clearing the billionaire of charges that marred his reputation as an internet pioneer.】

item.title: 越南市场下跌后反弹，Techcom 首次亮相即大涨
item.description: 科讯证券股份公司（Techcom Securities JSC）的股票在周二的首次交易中大涨，因为大盘从前一天因担心公司债券违规发行而出现的大跌中回升。【原文：Shares of Techcom Securities JSC jumped in their Tuesday trading debut as the broader market recovered from a selloff the previous day over concerns about corporate bond issuance violations.】

item.title: KKR 和 Quadrantis 将收购香港山顶再保险公司的少数股权
item.description: KKR & Co.和 Quadrantis Capital 同意收购总部位于香港的山顶再保险公司的少数股权。【原文：KKR & Co. and Quadrantis Capital agreed to acquire minority stakes in Hong Kong-based Peak Reinsurance Co.】

item.title: 澳大利亚煤炭国因阻碍转型而面临反弹
item.description: 澳大利亚昆士兰州的能源部长们表示，昆士兰州决定延长其燃煤发电厂的寿命，这可能会抑制为实现雄心勃勃的国家气候目标所需的可再生能源项目投资。【原文：The decision by Australia’s Queensland to extend the life of its coal-fired power fleet could chill investment in renewable projects needed to meet ambitious national climate targets, according to energy ministers from other states.】

item.title: 报道称日本将迎来首位女性财务大臣
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，即将成为日本首位女首相的日本执政党领袖高市真奈将任命片山聪树为日本首位女财务大臣。【原文：Japan’s ruling party leader Sanae Takaichi, who is poised to become the nation’s first female prime minister, is set to tap Satsuki Katayama as the country’s first female finance minister, according to local media.】

item.title: 分析师称泰国旅游业疲软将抑制泰铢年底涨势
item.description: 据分析师称，由于中国游客继续避开泰国，以及交易商押注降息，泰铢传统的年末涨势将被削弱。【原文：The Thai baht’s traditional year-end rally will be dimmed as Chinese tourists continue to shun the country and traders bet on interest rate cuts, according to analysts.】

item.title: Maynilad 将 2021 年以来菲律宾最大 IPO 定价定在最高端
item.description: Maynilad Water Services Inc.的首次公开募股定价达到了市场预期的最高价，使这家菲律宾公用事业公司有望成为菲律宾四年来最大规模的上市企业。【原文：Maynilad Water Services Inc. priced its initial public offering at the top of the marketed range, putting the Philippine utility firm on course for the country’s biggest listing in four years.】

item.title: 顶级预测师称，受政策风险影响，印尼盾有望创新低
item.description: 上一季度印尼卢比的最高预测者称，由于对印尼央行独立性的担忧挥之不去，投资者的信心受到打击，印尼卢比有跌至历史最低点的风险。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah is at risk of falling to a record low as lingering concerns over the central bank’s independence sap investor confidence, according to the currency’s top forecaster last quarter.】

item.title: 美澳达成协议后悉尼关键矿物库存激增
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内斯签署协议，促进美国获得稀土和其他关键材料之后，悉尼重要矿产生产商的股票大涨。【原文：Shares of critical mineral producers jumped in Sydney after US President Donald Trump signed an agreement with Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese to boost America’s access to rare earths and other key materials.】

item.title: 韩国早期贸易数据显示尽管加征关税，出口依然强劲
item.description: 尽管美国的关税影响了韩国的发展势头，而且节假日也造成了扭曲，但受惠于强劲的半导体需求，韩国 10 月份的早期出口仍有所增长。【原文：South Korea’s early exports advanced in October, aided by resilient semiconductor demand even as US tariffs weighed on momentum and holidays created distortions.】

item.title: 交易商关注盈余和中美贸易谈判，油价保持稳定
item.description: 在本周晚些时候中美两国举行贸易谈判之前，投资者权衡了盈余膨胀的迹象，石油价格持稳。【原文：Oil was steady as investors weighed signs of a swelling surplus ahead of trade talks between the US and China later this week.】

item.title: 逢低买盘涌现，黄金再现破纪录涨势
item.description: 由于交易商利用上周末的大幅下挫进行逢低买入，黄金逐渐接近上一交易日创下的纪录高点。【原文：Gold edged closer to the record high reached in the previous session, as traders took advantage of a sharp selloff at the end of last week to enter dip-buying.】

item.title: 中国燃料供应过剩导致冬季液化天然气进口持续低迷
item.description: 中国对海运天然气的需求在整个冬季都将保持低迷，因为充足的供应会抑制年底通常会出现的消费激增。【原文：Chinese demand for seaborne gas is poised to remain tepid through the winter, as ample supplies blunt the usual surge in consumption at the end of the year.】

item.title: 特朗普官员警告中国不要惩罚在美投资企业
item.description: 特朗普政府警告中国不要对帮助美国发展关键产业的外国公司实施报复，此前中国政府上周制裁了一家韩国航运巨头的美国分公司，原因是该公司计划在美国海运业投资。【原文：The Trump administration warned China not to retaliate against foreign companies helping the US to develop critical industries, after Beijing last week sanctioned the US units of a South Korean shipping giant over its plans to invest in the American maritime sector.】

item.title: 澳大利亚超越美国成为新西兰第二大出口市场
item.description: 由于贸易流动受到白宫关税政策和经济不确定性加剧的影响，澳大利亚上个月超过美国成为新西兰第二大出口市场。【原文：Australia overtook the US as New Zealand’s second-biggest export market last month as trade flows are buffeted by White House tariff policies and heightened economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 里夫斯承诺打击英国商业规则以促进增长
item.description: 英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将宣布政府将削减对企业的繁文缛节，以促进经济增长，同时为下月艰难的预算做准备。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will announce the government is cutting red tape for businesses in an attempt to boost economic growth as she prepares for a difficult budget next month.】

item.title: 高市将出任首相，日本股市将延续涨势
item.description: 日本股市周二有望继续刷新纪录高点，因为投资者押注由真荣孝一领导的新政府将维持扩张性财政政策。日元和长期债券仍然容易受到过度支出担忧的影响。【原文：Japanese stocks look poised to extend record highs Tuesday as investors wager that a new government to be led by Sanae Takaichi will maintain expansionary fiscal policy. The yen and long-maturity bonds remain vulnerable to concerns over excess spending.】

item.title: 华尔街财报提振亚洲期货：市场综述
item.description: 周二，美国股市因企业利润强劲和华盛顿与中国政府之间紧张关系缓和的迹象而上涨，亚洲股市随之攀升。【原文：Asian stocks were primed to climb Tuesday after US shares rose on robust corporate profits and signs of easing tensions between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 必和必拓加大对铜的关注力度，季度产量稳步上升
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）在第一季度提高了全球最大矿商的主要增长支柱--铜的产量，而铁矿石的产量则保持稳定。【原文：BHP Group boosted output of copper — a key growth pillar for the world’s biggest miner — in its first quarter, while production of iron ore was steady.】

item.title: 日本债券下挫，"寡妇制造者 "交易成为世界瞩目的焦点
item.description: 几十年来，全球债券基金一直被一种在日本被称为 "寡妇制造者 "的行业所吸引，并屡屡受挫。【原文：Global bond funds have for decades been attracted — and repeatedly burned — by a trade known in Japan as the ‘widow-maker.’】

item.title: 野村资产的新日本退休帮助团队由退休人员组成
item.description: 野村资产管理公司（Nomura Asset Management Co.【原文：Nomura Asset Management Co. asked retired workers in its corporate group to form a team to help clients invest their pension funds, to survive in one of the world’s fastest aging economies.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔称可靠的统计数据是稳健政策的 "支柱
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）警告说，破坏公众对统计数据和中央银行的信任可能会带来经济上的反效果。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel warned that undermining public trust in statistics and central banks could backfire economically.】
